snippet: Brazilian soccer fans could be barred from standing up, taking their shirts off, waving flags and playing musical instruments at Maracanã, the stadium’s administration said.
abstract: Fans who paid $2,500 for tickets to Lionel Messi’s charity game in Chicago will be eligible for refunds after he fails to show for a promised meet-and-greet after the game; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Brazilian soccer fans could be barred from standing up, taking their shirts off, waving flags and playing musical instruments at Maracanã, the stadium’s administration said.

headline.main: Brazilian Stadium Could Ban Shirtless Fans
